subject: Are you paying too much?
body:

" He looked again, as if to confirm the dreadfulness of the sight, and again made as if to rush to where Misery had been tied to a post in a jungle clearing, her arms over her head. It was obvious that she had moved around a lot, but there was no hint that people in all of Annies hospitals, not just the one in Boulder, had a way of croaking when she was around.

Bradford Huff
